tasks.task: Follows the herd from the barn to the pasture
subtasks: Opens the barn door
Guides the horses through the barn door
Leads the herd out of the barn
Directs the horses down the path to the pasture

tasks.task: Rounds up errant horses in the pasture
subtasks: Observes the herd from a distance to locate stragglers
Walks towards a lone horse in the pasture
Does a saddle horse round-up to retrieve the straggler
Uses a rope or lariat to catch the horse
Leads the captured horse back to the herd

tasks.task: Harnesses a horse for work
subtasks: Approaches the horse from the side
Attaches the harness to the horse's collar
Checks the fit and security of the harness
Leads the horse to the work area

tasks.task: Loads horses onto a trailer
subtasks: Ensures the trailer is secure and horse-proof
Tackles the horses to mount them safely
Assists horses onto the trailer
Secures the horses in the trailer

tasks.task: Shifts the position of feed sacks in the barn
subtasks: Lifts a feed sack from the floor
Carries the sack across the barn aisle
Aims the sack towards an empty feeder
Releases the sack, allowing it to slide into place

tasks.task: Sweeps the barn floor
subtasks: Approaches the broom
Grips the broom handle with both hands
Moves the broom back and forth across the barn floor
Removes dirt and debris from the floor

tasks.task: Loads crop into a tractor trailer
subtasks: Lifts the bin or container onto the trailer bed
Secures the bin to the trailer using straps
Inspects the load for stability

tasks.task: Operates a combine harvester
subtasks: Climbs onto the combine
Engages the engine and starts the machine
Adjusts the harvesting width and speed
Loads the chopped crop into the hopper
Guides the machine through the fields
